fields.Name: Sterak's Gage
fields.Description: +500 Health +25% Base Attack Damage UNIQUE Passive: Upon taking at least 400 to 1800 damage (based on level) within 5 seconds, gain Sterak's Fury for 8 seconds (45 second cooldown). Sterak's Fury: Grow in size and strength, gaining increased Size, +25% additional Base Attack Damage, and a rapidly decaying Shield for 30% of your maximum Health.
